data.description: Compare table structures of 2 MySQL dbs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Noone else appears to have produced a module with similar
    functionality, but the utility has been available from my website
    for quite a while now and several people seem to have found it very
    useful. MySQL::Diff seems the most intuitive name. Is Chapter 6 or 7
    of the module list more suitable?
